questions.text:
You just recorded an in your opinion insanely good new album and
want everyone in the fuckin world to know that.
What do you do?

answers.text: You 'gift' it to every Apple-user and force those fuckers to listen to it.
You blow it in your car speakers and drive around town all day.
You screw some random moviestar and get enough press anyways.

questions.text:
As a kid your parents force you to go to church.
What do you do?

answers.text: You explain them, you don't need to go, god loves you anyway.
You go, get wasted on the preacher's wine and smoke some incense
